ProfileViewModel - Class in com.example.eventapp.viewmodels
ProfileViewModel is a ViewModel that manages and interacts with the data needed for the user profile screen.
ProfileViewModel() - Constructor for class com.example.eventapp.viewmodels.ProfileViewModel
Initialization of the ViewModel, getting both userRepository and facilityRepository for later use Then, it takes the current User's live data from the userRepository, which is what the ViewModel primarily operates with, and sets a forever observer on it
